knowledge.badge: Knowledge: Environmental Hostility as Life Force
knowledge.heading: Environmental Hostility as Life Force
knowledge.description: The text reveals how harsh natural conditions, rather than defeating the human spirit, can strengthen passionate resistance. The hostile environment becomes an adversary to fight against, giving the narrator's defiance a concrete target and greater intensity.
knowledge.pattern_connection: Passionate self-advocacy transforms environmental hardship into personal struggle, allowing the narrator to advocate against nature itself while demonstrating her resilient spirit.

device_examples.quote: winds shrivelled every blade of grass
device_examples.effect: Creates vivid sensory evidence of harsh conditions that the narrator must passionate argue against and survive.

device_examples.quote: sun seemed to glory in his power
device_examples.effect: Creates an adversarial relationship between narrator and environment, giving her passionate resistance a concrete target.
